title: High Urban Population Concentration
description: In 2024, Georgia had 1,084,471 people living in urban agglomerations of more than 1 million, indicating a significant urban population concentration.

title: Efficient Business Location Operations
description: Georgia achieved a high score of 95.5 in 2024 for the operational efficiency of establishing a business location, showcasing its conducive environment for business setup.

title: Top-tier Financial Services Efficiency
description: In 2024, Georgia scored 98.23 for the operational efficiency of receiving financial services, highlighting its robust financial service infrastructure.

title: Strong Business Location Score
description: With an overall score of 83.01 in 2024, Georgia is recognized for its favorable conditions for business locations.

title: Competitive Labor Market
description: Georgia's labor market scored 83.46 in 2024, reflecting its competitive and efficient labor environment.

title: High Female Educational Attainment
description: In 2023, 27.39% of Georgian women aged 25+ had attained at least a Master's degree, indicating a well-educated female population.

title: High Education Expenditure
description: In 2023, Georgia allocated 38.20% of its total expenditure in public institutions to current education, reflecting a significant investment in education.
